hero.title: What is Vriends?
hero.description: Vriends is an application that allows you to keep track of your friendships. Vriends can be used to store useful information about your friends like gift idea's or even birthdays.

cards.title: Maintain your friendships
cards.description: Each friendship is represented with a flower. Friendships, like all things, need maintenance. If you don't see or speak with your friends, the flower will lose its petals.
